This product is not just an item; it's a solution designed to enhance your daily experiences. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, we're extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $75. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your life with our top-tier product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer
